summary: Improves DB outfit textures & includes Oblivion-style replacer for Robes.
descriptionHtml:
Dark Brotherhood Outfits Redone
by XunAmarox

Description:
Well, I thought the Dark Brotherhood in Skyrim looked like a bunch of little wusses in their unbloodied pumpkin orange armor and silly pantsed robes. So, I decided to fix it. I made a male version too so I wouldn\'t leave the male players out, but I don\'t play a male character so I\'m not sure how it looks. Should look alright!

You have two verions to choose from.

Vanilla: Just retextures the standard Dark Brotherhood outfits that come with Skyrim.

Oblivion: Replaces the Dark Brotherhood Robes mesh with Necromancer Robes mesh. Necromancer Robes are retextured to be darker and bloodied. So Necromancers are going to have the same type of robe as you, but I didn\'t put the black hand on it, so it should be fine-ish lore-wise. But this version IS a replacer for the robe.

Installation:

Default install is Vanilla. If you want the Oblivion style robes, you\'ll have to copy that over too.

1. Paste /Data/ into /Data/.
2. If you want the oblivion style robes, paste that into the appropriate directory.

Version History
1.4 - Update. db-Greybeard Hood added. Replaces DB Hood with retextured Greybeard hood. Goes best with db-Sithis package for the retextured Greybeard robe as well.
1.3 - Update. db-Sithis updated. Adds mask textures for males.
1.2 - Update. Added db-Sithis. Replaces db robe, replaces nightingale hood [optional], requires main file. See readme.
1.1 - Minor update. Changes blood splatter spec maps for female armor & Oblivion robe.
1.0 - release
author: XunAmarox
